title: Desirable location, 2 bed 1 bath, extraordinary views! Make it yours
map_address: 6097 Memorial Dr near South Hairston Road
posting_body: ['Wildwood At Stone Mountain', '6097 Memorial Dr Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'Pricing:', '$1673/Month*', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Footage:', '972 sq ft', 'No specials at this time.', 'Features in this apartment home:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Garbage Disposal', '◾ Handicap Accessible', '◾ Heating', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Patio or Balcony', '◾ Range', '◾ Alarm Systems in Select Apartments', '◾ All Appliances are Electric', '◾ Walk-in Closets in Select Apartments', '◾ Washers and Dryers Provided in Most Apartments', '◾ Water Based on Usage', '◾ White on White Kitchens', 'About the community:', 'A hidden treasure in the shadow of Stone Mountain.', 'Make yourself at home in your choice of spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes.', 'Relax on your private patio or balcony.', 'Enjoy an array of amenities including a sparkling pool.', 'fitness gym and Resident Business Center, all in the natural setting only 2 miles from Stone Mountain Park.', 'What a smart move!', 'Amenities at our property:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Freeway Access', '◾ Gated', '◾ Onsite Maintenance', '◾ Onsite Management', '◾ Playground', '◾ Pool', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Shopping Nearby', '◾ 2 Miles from Stone Mountain Park', '◾ Controlled Access Entry Gates', '◾ Georgia Perimeter College Minutes Away', '◾ Marta Bus Stop at Community Entry', '◾ Professionally Landscaped', '◾ Sparkling Pool with Fountains', '◾ Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', 'Additional information:', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Pet friendly.', 'No pets over 10 pounds and no aggressive breeds.', ' $300 pet fee, $500 for two pets and $35 per pet each month.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally managed by Peak Living', '*Prices are subject to change without notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '48CDE2F219E7450']
